name: pods-blitz
description: Pods-Blitz is a self-hosted podcatcher that supports RSS feed parsing, episode downloads, and media playback management. It includes a simple web UI for listening and browsing.
features: RSS feed parsing: Subscribe to podcast feeds and automatically fetch new episodes.
Episode downloads: Download podcast episodes for offline listening and archival.
Web player: Stream episodes directly in the browser with playback controls.
Subscription management: Organize and manage podcast subscriptions in one place.
Episode queue: Create listening queues to organize episodes you want to hear.
Playback progress: Track listening progress and resume episodes where you left off.
Search functionality: Find podcasts and episodes by title, description, or keywords.
Episode filtering: Filter episodes by date, duration, or played status.
Storage management: Configure automatic deletion of old episodes to manage disk space.
OPML support: Import and export podcast subscriptions using standard OPML format.
Minimal interface: Clean, simple UI focused on essential podcast management features.
Privacy focused: Self-hosted solution keeps your listening habits private.
